item.title: A shiny WebApp of the Lake Tanganyika
item.description: Introduction Shiny is an R package that was created by Joe Cheng. It wraps R code into interactive web applications so R coders do not need to learn HTML, CSS or JavaScript. This tool is powerful and useful, tool available to users of R. Shiny provides a framework for building interactive web apps that can be used for visualization, exploratory data analysis, data quality control â€“ really anything that could benefit from an interactive environment.
